General.Name: Snow Lake Resources Ltd
General.Description: Snow Lake Resources Ltd., a natural resource exploration company, engages in the exploration and development of mineral resources in Canada. The company explores for lithium mineral resources. It holds interest in the Thompson Brothers Lithium property covering an area of 55,318 acres; and a 100% interest in Snow Lake Lithium property comprising 122 mineral claims covering an area of 22,386.30 hectares located in north central Manitoba. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is based in Winnipeg, Canada.
General.Address: 242 Hargrave Street, Winnipeg, MB, Canada, R3C 0V1

2.Name: Mr. Dale L. Schultz M.Sc., P. Geo.
